channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greenland Sharks Are Soaking Up Pollutants — That’s Bad News For The Arctic
item.description: Greenland sharks are revealing alarming clues about pollution in one of the planet’s last pristine frontiers.

item.title: Google Confirms Android Attacks—No Fix For Most Samsung Users
item.description: Your phone is at risk until you get this update — bad news for millions of Galaxy owners.
